page.title: 08 PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {Kiss catch} To play kiss catch you need any amount of people. The boys run after the girls and when they catch them they kiss them. Then the boys run away and the girls chase them. {Chain Tig} To play chain tig you have any amount of people.One person is 'on' and has to try and tig (touch) you.when you have been tigged you hold hands with the person that is 'on' and together you try to tig another person. When all the people hane been tigged and on the chain then the game starts again and the person who was tigged first is 'on' {High ,Low ,Medium, Slow} This is a skipping game.Two people turn the rope singing "High,low,medium slow,dolly rocker."But when they say "pepper" the rope is turned very fast.
